subtitles.text: Hello everyone, welcome to our English lesson!
Today we will learn basic English vocabulary.
Please repeat after me: Hello, Hello, Hello.
Thank you is used to express gratitude.
Say 'Thank you' when someone helps you.
Please is used to make polite requests.
For example: Please help me, please sit down.
Sorry is used to apologize for mistakes.
These are essential words for daily conversation.
Thank you for watching this English lesson!
